macro_Caiani_action_set module¶

Macro Model Action Set

class macro_Caiani_action_set.MacroEcoActionSet[source]¶

Bases: actions.ActionSet

Common actions for the economic model

compute_production_price()[source]¶

Agent compute production price

form_expectations(step, z_t_1, z_e_t_1, lmbda)[source]¶

The agent forms zie expectation using the following equation:

z^e = z^e_{t-1} + lambda(z_{t-1} - z^e_{t-1}) where: z is the value of the voi and lambda(lmbda)

is the impact of the variable of interest in the expectation.

get_highest_offer(market)[source]¶

A market answers the offer with the highest value (in the market.offers ordered dict)

get_lowest_offer(market)[source]¶

A market answers the offer with the lowest value (in the market.offers ordered dict)

has_offers(market)[source]¶

A market answers if is has offers (True or False)

no_of_offers(market)[source]¶

A market answers the number of offers it has

include an offer in the market

pay_taxes(an_agent)[source]¶

return_offer(market, gs)[source]¶

A market receives an offer of a good or service
